location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Circular letter from Richard Goodwin, Secretary and Translator in the Office of Country Correspondence, to Captain William Bruce, Resident at Bushire

mods.abstract: The letter is a covering letter enclosing two further letters (neither being included in the volume). The first letter is to His Royal Highness Hussain Alli [Hussain Ali Mirza], Prince Regent of Fars. The second is to the His Excellency Mohomed Hussain Khan [Muhammad Hussain Khan], Prime Minister of Tehran.
